snippet.title: "The Blue Flamingo" Announce trailer
snippet.description:
Start Playing The Blue Flamingo and advance on the score board.Visit our steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/302010

The Blue Flamingo is a small video game built completely with handmade models. The special effects are constructed from filmed firecrackers, and the music and sound affects are created with analog instruments and objects. 

Models created by: http://www.andershellstrom.com/

Read more about The Blue Flamingo and our other projects at: http://www.mightanddelight.com
